name: A Sigh of Relief Quiz | Vocabulary | 20 Questions

questions.explanation:
cyclops.

	In Greek mythology, a cyclops was a horrible monster with one eye in the center of its forehead.

Silas.

	Silas Marner is George Eliot's fictional miser. After the miserly weaver's stash of golden coins is stolen, he adopts a golden-haired orphaned child and names her Eppie.

silence.

	Silence is golden.

psychology & psychiatry.

	This word's Greek root, "psyche," means mind or soul.

questions.text: To move sideways -- to _______ up to someone?
questions.explanation:
sidle.

	Cats often sidle up to you so they can rub against your leg.

questions.text: A reference book with alphabetized informational articles?
questions.explanation:
encyclopedia & encyclopaedia.

	These days it's easier to use the Internet than to look something up in an encyclopedia.

sciatica.

	It gets its name from the sciatic nerve that runs down the back of the leg.

questions.text: Some call this a religion, and others call it a cult.
questions.explanation:
Scientology.

	Founded by L. Ron Hubbard.

Simon.

	Then there's Paul Simon, Simon Legree and Simple Simon (who met a pieman).

silo.

	In the movie Witness, a villain met his end in one. They are usually cylindrical.

questions.text: Where you are now (since you're on the Internet)?
questions.explanation:
cyberspace & cyber space.

	This word was added to Webster's Dictionary in 1986.

questions.text: The branch of biology that deals with cells?
questions.explanation: cytology.

Cy.

	Denton True "Cy" Young (1867-1955) was one of the greatest pitchers in baseball. He pitched 511 winning games.
cipher & cypher.

scion.

	This word usually connotes wealth and power--"the scion of a distinguished family."

Siam.

	"Anna and the King of Siam" takes place in Thailand.
cyborg.

questions.text: When you hear one behind your car you should pull over and stop.
questions.explanation: siren.
sayonara.

questions.text: A twister--the kind that took Dorothy to Oz?
questions.explanation:
cyclone.

	Dorothy didn't hide in the cyclone cellar because she was looking for Toto.
